Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Akho, ki uha alaha ika hai
Alaha kise ciza da loravada nahim
Na usa di ko'i aulada hai ate na uha kise di aulada
Ate ko'i usa de barabara nahim
Akho, maim sarana magada ham, savera de raba di
Hara ciza di bura'i tom jihari usa ne paida kiti
Hanere di bura'i tom jadom uha (hanera) cha jave
Ate gadham te (parha-parha ke) phukam marana vali'am di bura'i tom
Ate irakha karana vale'di bura'i tom, jadom uha irakha kare
Akho, maim sarana magada ham, lokam de raba di
(Saitana) vasavasa (mara khi'ala) pa'una vale di bura'i tom, jihara (alaha da nama suna ke) luka janda hai
Jihara lokam de dilam vica vasavasa (mara khi'ala) pa'unda hai
